channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Social Feed Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Social Feed Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-25120|2024-08-03T19:56:10.563Z -- unknown -- easy%20social%20feed%20pro
item.description: The Easy Social Feed Free and Pro WordPress plugins before 6.2.7 do not sanitise some of their parameters used via AJAX actions before outputting them back in the response, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues
